subtitle.text: Integrate with the NACSIS central catalog and ILL system
Integrate with the NACSIS central catalog and ILL system

description.text: This app is used for integrating Alma with the NACSIS central catalog. The app support the followings: Manage holding records from the NACSIS-CAT for a given Bibliographic record in Alma. Copy cataloging of NACSIS-CAT Bibliographic and Authority records to Alma. Contribution of new or edited Bibliographic and Authority records to NACSIS-CAT. This app is supported by Ex Libris. Currently available for beta testing.
